mapper.select: SELECT lecture_title, lecture_cost, std_name(c.student_number) as student_name, TO_CHAR(request_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS request_date, TO_CHAR(approval_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS approval_date, charge_code, charge_number FROM charge c JOIN lecture l ON c.lecture_number = l.lecture_number WHERE student_number in (SELECT student_number FROM student WHERE parent_number = #{parentNumber}) ORDER BY charge_number
mapper.update: UPDATE charge SET charge_code = '결제완료', request_date = sysdate WHERE charge_number = #{chargeNumber}
